original_title: 50 Things to Eat Before You Die
overview: Savour the top gastronomic delights that every diner should sample in their lifetime, as voted for by members of the public. It's a mouth-watering journey through childhood favourites, exotic dishes and bizarre but delicious fare.
tagline: In March 2004 we asked you to vote for the top 50 things everyone should try a bite of in their lifetime.
title: 50 Things to Eat Before You Die
